Translations.Text: My sent Noah jeho ludia saying O moj ludia kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous
leaders disbelieved jeho ludia said This bol ziaden inak than human ona chudoba zisk prominence ona. Had GOD willed He sent angels. My never heard anything this our predok
He len clovek ist crazy Iba ignorovat him for awhile
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory they disbelieved mna

My potom inspirovat him Robit watercraft our watchful oci v accordance s our inspiracia! When our command pojdem atmosphere boils up put it pair z kazdy laskavy (z tvoj domesticated zviera) tvoj rodina except those condemned doomed Nie speak do Mna on behalf z those transgressed they drowned
Once ona zaplatit dohromady those bol ona watercraft ona say ‘Chvalit GOD for saving us z zly ludia
say ‘Moj Lord let mna disembark zehnat location; Ona je dobre zachranca
These zadovazit sufficient proofs ona! My istota put ona test
Subsequently my zriadit iny generation after them
My sent do them posol z them saying Ona kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous
